title: Sen. Amy Klobuchar | Bombshell Evidence Emerges as House Sends Impeachment Articles to Senate: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the House voting to send the articles of impeachment against President Trump as damning new evidence against Trump’s henchmen emerges.

Then, Senator Amy Klobuchar talks about the last debate before the Iowa caucus, her history with Ambassador Yovanovitch and Trump’s impeachment trial.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
